document_data.name: Chamal Avenue
document_data.mainbody: '''Chamal Avenue''' was a road in [[Myth Nantar]] leading east from the [[Fire Fountain]] at the city's center, to the [[Mermaid's Gate]] at its edge. It was named after [[Chamal]], the only mermaid Dukar, and was paved with aqua-colored mosaics.{{cite book/Sea of Fallen Stars|173}}
